channel.title: Need help with korasi spec! Please help!
channel.description: So I have korasi in my pi server. Correct gfx/animation. All I need help is adding the special bar which I believe is in itemassistant, and making the special work which I belive is in combatassistant. Fairly new to java anything can help!
